article: pace bowler andrew flintoff claimed three wickets to pin indian on the back foot after england 's wagging tail bolstered its first innings score on the second day of the third and final cricket test bangalore on thursday .
abstract: flintoff 's breakthrough pins india on the back foot after kumble
